infodynamics.networkinference.interregional
Class InterregionalMutualInfo

java.lang.Object
  infodynamics.networkinference.interregional.InterregionalChannelMeasure
      infodynamics.networkinference.interregional.InterregionalMutualInfo

public class InterregionalMutualInfo
extends InterregionalChannelMeasure

Compute a significance score for the inter-regional mutual information between two sets, based on looking at transfer between elements taken e at a time.

Author:
Joseph Lizier, joseph.lizier at gmail.com
